description.fr: Lorsque vous appliquez un état\_: Inflige {value:p, percent} de l'{%AT} de votre héros autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de lui.
description.en: When you apply a state: Inflicts {value:p, percent} of your hero's {%AT} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> them.
description.es: Cuando aplicas un estado: Inflige un {value:p, percent} del {%AT} de tu héroe a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.de: Wenn du einen Zustand wirkst: Verursacht {value:p, percent} des {%AT} deines Helden ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> als Schaden.
description.pt: Ao aplicar um estado: Inflige {value:p, percent} do {%AT} do seu herói em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.
